sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.ProcessSyncTablesList</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Provides the list of allowed tables for process sync</description> <name>ProcessSyncTablesList</name> <script><![CDATA[var ProcessSyncTablesList = Class.create(); ProcessSyncTablesList.prototype = { initialize: function() { }, process: function(){ return sn_ih.ProcessSyncCaptureHelper.getAllowedTables(); }, type: 'ProcessSyncTablesList' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-07-10 22:34:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5cbb976f77711010efb691572b1061e1</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ProcessSyncTablesList</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="IntegrationHub Remote Process Sync Framework Data Model" source="com.glide.hub.process.sync.model">e47fbfb42f010110d8a4d5f62799b674</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5cbb976f77711010efb691572b1061e1</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-07-10 22:34:01</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>241</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
